search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Crelate (crelate.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Crelate is: [https://www.crelate.com/pricing](https://www.crelate.com/pricing)【3:0†source】.

extracted_content.content:

Talent Platforms for Talent Organizations
-----------------------------------------

You need intuitive, flexible, integrated software to power the modern recruiting and staffing firm. Crelate offers enterprise-class tech, award-winning support, and transparent pricing designed to work for every talent business.
